body.p: This project draws on a number of resources:

section.title: CEDICT Project
section.p: The CC-CEDICT project is an open-source Simplified Chinese dictionary reflecting about 140,000 words. It is the basis for the dictionary used in the i18n library's Simplified Chinese collator.

section.title: Hanban HSK exam Preparation Resources (HSK东西)
section.p: This site provides resources that support studying for the Hanban HSK (Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi) exam, a free Chinese proficiency exam for Chinese language learners. The i18n project uses word lists and sample sentences from the hskhks project as source data for exercising the zh-CN collation and other processing.
